name: Papa's Vinegar Chicken
author: COASTERPHILE
summary: This is definitely NOT the healthiest way to grill chicken, but it's my grandfather's recipe and he's 92! My kids are the ones who have named this chicken -- they LOVE it!
ingredients: 4  bone-in chicken breast halves, with skin
directions: Bring the margarine, apple cider vinegar, Worcestershire sauce, and salt to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat
Stir until salt has dissolved, and add the chicken breast halves
Return to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, and cook until the chicken is tender and no longer pink inside, about 30 minutes
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat, and lightly oil the grate
Grill the chicken breasts on the preheated grill until the skin is browned, lightly charred in spots, and shows good grill marks, about 5 minutes per side
